title: Tell Qraya
description: Hilltop settlement on the Euphrates settled sometime in the 6th-5th millennium BCE, reached a peak towards the end of the 4th millenium, was abandoned at the beginning of the 3rd millennium, and was reoccupied in the Old Babylonian period.

properties.description: Point based on an OpenStreetMap node representing Tell Qraya after Simpson 1988.
properties.title: OSM location of Tell Qraya
